p: 4-Allyl-2-methoxyphenol, eugenol 1 was obtained by hydrodistillation from clove to a high degree of purity (≥95%), as confirmed by its 1H NMR spectrum, and used in the synthesis of six O-alkylated derivatives ( 2a–f) and five oxiranes ( 3a–e), as shown in Scheme 1. The structures of all the compounds were confirmed by 1H and 13C NMR spectroscopy and high-resolution mass spectrometry (HRMS), and the corresponding analytical data are shown below.
